story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0300: Such an annoying presence you are.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0400:
You investigated us back in Unova—and you insist
on being a hindrance to us here on Pasio, too?
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0600:
It’s your fault! All because Team Plasma stole
Pokémon from their Trainers!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0700: The Shadow Triad have told me things about you.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0800:
You’re that young boy who got angry at us for
stealing your family’s Pokémon. Am I correct?
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_0900:
That’s right! I won’t allow you and Team Plasma
to just keep doing what you want!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1100:
I can’t ignore what you and Team Plasma
are doing.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1200:
You’ve been using Pokémon in your experiments,
and if you keep taking Pokémon away from their
Trainers here on Pasio...
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1300: I will stop you, no matter what it takes!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1400:
Your determination is admirable. As a Trainer,
you must think yourself a paragon of virtue.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1500: However, I do find it very strange.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1600:
A boy whose family’s Pokémon was stolen all
because of Team Plasma...
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1700:
And another boy who used to be the king of
Team Plasma...
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_1800: You’re now working together, hand in hand?
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2100: Myah-ha-ha-ha! So you don’t know anything!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2200:
Very well, allow me to reveal who this boy
really is!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2400:
He was the king of Team Plasma, who led efforts
to liberate all Pokémon!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2500:
The reason your family’s Pokémon were stolen
was to make N’s ideals come true!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2700:
Your enemy—the person you should hate—has
been standing right next to you all along!
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_2900:
I believed the liberation of Pokémon was the right
thing to do...
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_3000: And I did lead Team Plasma.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_3300:
I learned how wonderful it is for people and
Pokémon to live together.
story_teamplasma_02_02000/2401_1001_3400:
For the people and Pokémon who live on Pasio,
I will...
